name: The Time Paradox
description:
Play an RPG from the future and the past! Explore a gap between 2 towns built 200 years apart, using a time portal built by your father!

Controls- Arrow keys to move, L.Shift to sprint (Always sprint can be found in settings), F4 to make the game go fullscreen. #action #adventure #rpg

Discord server: https://discord.gg/M4Btpvff2N
